column3: service quality was a bit off today. When we came in the restaurant
column4: we stood at the front for maybe 5-10 minutes just waiting before there was actually a server to put my friend and I on the waiting list. There was no worker to organize the line
column5: so many of us were clustered at the front not knowing what to do. Not a deal breaker
column6: but just something to point out. Food quality is still most important and glad Snooze gets it right!
